title: Navbar renders correctly with glassmorphism effect
description: Verify that the fixed navigation bar renders properly with the glassmorphism effect on desktop screens.

steps.description: Open the homepage on a desktop screen.
Check that the navbar is fixed at the top and has the glassmorphism visual effect.

title: Navbar mobile menu functionality
description: Verify the navbar mobile menu opens and closes correctly and is accessible on mobile devices.

steps.description: Open the homepage on a mobile device or mobile viewport.
Tap the mobile menu icon to open the menu.
Check that the mobile menu expands showing navigation links.
Tap the close button or a navigation link.
Verify the mobile menu closes properly.

title: Hero section background slideshow and animations
description: Ensure the hero section shows the animated background slideshow and other animations smoothly.

steps.description: Load the homepage.
Verify the background slideshow cycles through images automatically.
Verify that animations on the hero text and elements are triggered and perform smoothly.

title: Services section grid layout rendering
description: Validate that the services offered are displayed in a clear grid layout with correct content.

steps.description: Navigate to the Services section.
Check that services are displayed in a grid layout with consistent styling.
Verify each service item contains title and description or icons as expected.

title: Portfolio gallery hover effects
description: Confirm that portfolio items display hover effects correctly on mouse over to showcase projects.

steps.description: Navigate to the Portfolio section.
Hover the mouse cursor over a portfolio item.
Verify that the portfolio item's hover effect is triggered, such as overlay or animation.

title: Venue accordion expands and collapses details
description: Ensure venue list accordions expand to show details on click and collapse when clicked again or another accordion is opened.

steps.description: Navigate to the Venue section.
Click on a venue accordion header.
Verify the accordion expands and reveals detailed information.
Click on the same accordion header again.
Verify the accordion collapses hiding the details.
Click on a different venue accordion header.
Verify the new accordion expands and previous accordion collapses.

title: Contact section email copy feature
description: Test that the email copy button reliably copies the correct email address to the clipboard on various browsers.

steps.description: Navigate to the Contact section.
Click the email copy button.
Verify the email address is copied to the clipboard.
Paste the clipboard content to confirm the email address text.

title: Responsive design on desktop, tablet, and mobile
description: Check the entire website layout adjusts correctly and usability is maintained across desktop, tablet, and mobile screen sizes.

steps.description: Open the website on a desktop browser.
Verify layout is properly rendered and all elements are visible and accessible.
Resize browser or open on tablet viewport.
Verify the layout adjusts without overlapping or broken styling.
Open the website on a mobile device or small viewport.
Verify mobile menu is functional and all sections are accessible and correctly displayed.

title: Smooth navigation between sections using navbar
description: Verify that clicking navigation links in the fixed navbar scrolls smoothly to the corresponding page sections.

steps.description: Load the homepage.
Click each navbar navigation link one by one.
Confirm the page scrolls smoothly to the related section on each click.

title: Animation performance and absence of jank
description: Validate that all animations and transitions in the app run smoothly without delays or stuttering.

steps.description: Navigate through homepage and various sections multiple times.
Observe animations to ensure they play fluidly without lag or jank.

title: Application build completes successfully
description: Check that the application can build without any errors or warnings using the Vite build process.

steps.description: Run the build command for the app.
Verify the build completes successfully with zero errors.

title: Application passes linting checks with no errors
description: Ensure codebase adheres to linting rules and no lint errors or warnings are reported.

steps.description: Run the project's linting tool on the codebase.
Verify that there are zero linting errors or warnings.
